column4: hola, anyone know of any issues with Azureus and Ubuntu?  my net goes to a crawl when it is running.
azureus does that in windows too, try to fiddle with the number of connections settings and set limits on up/download
for me it turned out that my cheap 3com router is the bottleneck .. only handles 250 connections
thanks that's what I am trying to do.  oh I have a Dlink 624 may be that's it
